mapper.select: select #{chr} as f_chr, f_start, f_end, f_sample_id, f_se_id, f_cell_source, f_cell_type, f_tissue_type, f_cell_state from t_enhancer_sedb_${genome}_${chr} WHERE -- Case 1: The annotation region is completely within the gene region (f_start >= #{start} AND f_end <= #{end}) -- Case 2: The annotation region completely contains the gene region OR (f_start <= #{start} AND f_end >= #{end}) -- Case 3: The start position of the annotation region is within the gene region, and the end position is outside OR (f_start > #{start} AND f_start < #{end} AND f_end > #{end}) -- Case 4: The start position of the annotation region is outside the gene region, and the end position is within the gene region OR (f_start < #{start} AND f_end > #{start} AND f_end < #{end})
